usr_func package¶

Submodules¶

usr_func.is_even module¶

This function tests if a given integer is even or not.

usr_func.is_even.is_even(value: int) → bool¶

Checks if a given integer even or not.

Parameters:

value – integer value

Returns: True if it is even, False or else.

usr_func.is_list_empty module¶

This function tests if a given list is empty or not.

usr_func.is_list_empty.is_list_empty(glist)¶

Tests if a given list is empty or not.

Parameters:

glist – can be nested list such as [], [[]], [[[]]] etc.

Returns: True if it is empty, such as [], [[]], [[[]]], etc.
